## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0b85c24be03cc1591f4f90aaa715d90239fc057662818a7078b3431cbea2e44f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'sentry-ui' @ 296.8.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
